toolingFieldDefinition.Label: PO Receipt UI Without Selection Defaults
Show Price in PO Receipt Details Page
Use Salesforce Approvals for Ind. Reqs

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field defined by the formula_extid field. Neither the formula_extid, nor the externalid field itself, is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: External Id
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__externalid__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, allows the user to override Approved Manufacturers on the PO Line.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Allow Approved Manufacturer Override
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_allowmfrovr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Auto Number Indirect Requisitions. If selected, order numbers are established using the Order Number Assign program in System Setup. If not selected, indirect material requisition numbers are entered manually.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Auto Number Indirect Requisition
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_autonumsyreq__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, PO dates can be maintained independently (without regard to Lead Time setting offsets) once a PO reaches Status 5 - Approved.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Dates Independent From Status 5
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_dateupdate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, when in the PO Receipt page, 'Receive All Lines' checkbox is hidden, the 'Receive' checkbox on PO Line to receive is defaulted to unchecked rather than checked and the Receipt Quantity will not be defaulted.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Receipt UI Without Selection Defaults
toolingEntityParticle.MasterLabel: PO Receipt UI Without Selection Defaults
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_defltnosel__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the default Group used as a Requesting Group for a PO using a Vendor that supplies Direct Material.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Organizational Dept (Direct)
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_dirmtlrequestorg__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocntl__c.rstk__pocntl_dirmtlrequestorg__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>When adding a POCNTL record, this field should be initialized to the SYORG_ORGID whose: SYORG_DIV = POCNTL_DIV SYORG_DIRMTLORGIND = ‘T’ It can be overridden This is group for which the approval levels are established on purchase orders (POHDR_REQUESTORG) for those vendors that supply direct materials. This field cannot be null and must be a valid Group (i.e. the SYORG_DIV = POCNTL_DIV and the SYORG_ORGID = POCNTL_DIRMTLREQUESTORG) When adding a purchase order, if the Vendor selected is one that supplies direct material (i.e. POVEND_DIRMTLIND = ‘T’), then the POHDR_REQUESTORG is initialized to this POCNTL_DIRMTLREQUESTORG value. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This is the default Group used as a Requesting Group for a PO using a Vendor that supplies Direct Material.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Organizational Dept (Direct)</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syorg__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>PO Controls</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>PO_Control_Records</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Division
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_div__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocntl__c.rstk__pocntl_div__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This is the Division that this control record is established for.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Division</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__sydiv__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>PO Controls</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>pocntls</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Allows user to insert additional detail lines to properly line up the PO template on the printed page (used to adjust the vertical dimension in the body if the PO). Can be used to accommodate custom fields added to the email template used for printing.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Extra Detail Lines
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_extradetails__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Allows the user to insert additional header lines to properly line up the PO template on the printed page (used to adjust the vertical dimension in the PO Header). Can be used to accommodate custom fields added to the email template used for printing.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Extra Header Lines
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_extraheader__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: If Checkbox is checked, then when an Indirect Item is added to a PO for the first time, a Purchase Item Master for the Item will be automatically added(using the Indirect Material Commodity Code defined on this record).
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Z_OBSOLETE
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_inditemautoaddind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value indicates where Indirect Material Receipts are authorized, if required. Options are: None, Indirect Material Processed and Authorized in Receiving Screen, in PO Item Receipts or in PO Authorizations.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Indirect Material Authorization Ind
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_indmtlauthind__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocntl__c.rstk__pocntl_indmtlauthind__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Valid values are: ‘R’ – Indirect Material processed in Receiving Screen and Authorized in Receiving Screen (Default) ‘A’ - ‘Indirect Material NOT processed in Receiving Screen and Authorized in Authorization Screen (which is the departmental authorization) Note: ‘R’ is the only valid value at this time; ‘A’ is a future capability. IF SYCONFIG_INVENTORY # ‘T’ POCNTL_INDMTLAUTHIND can only be ‘A’ Therefore default is ‘A’ (and really no need to display on the screen) IF SYCONFIG_INVENTORY = ‘T’ POCNTL_INDMTLAUTHIND can be any of the values above Default is ‘R’ (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This value indicates where Indirect Material Receipts are authorized, if required. Options are: None, Indirect Material Processed and Authorized in Receiving Screen, in PO Item Receipts or in PO Authorizations.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Indirect Material Authorization Ind</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>true</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Indirect Material is Authorized and Received in PO Item Receipts</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Indirect Material is Authorized and Received in PO Item Receipts</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Indirect Material is Authorized and Received in PO Authorizations</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Indirect Material is Authorized and Received in PO Authorizations</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Indirect Material processed and Authorized in Receiving</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Indirect Material processed and Authorized in Receiving</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the default Group used to initialize the Requesting Group for a PO using a Vendor that supplies Indirect Material.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Organizational Dept (Indirect)
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_indmtlrequestorg__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocntl__c.rstk__pocntl_indmtlrequestorg__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>This is group for which the approval levels are established on purchase orders (POHDR_REQUESTORG) for those vendors that supply indirect materials. This field cannot be null and must be a valid Group (i.e. the SYORG_DIV = POCNTL_DIV and the SYORG_ORGID = POCNTL_INDMTLREQUESTORG) When adding a purchase order, if the Vendor selected is one that supplies service (i.e. POVEND_INDMTLIND = ‘T’) and does not supply direct material NOR service, then the POHDR_REQUESTORG is initialized to this POCNTL_INDMTLREQUESTORG value. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This is the default Group used to initialize the Requesting Group for a PO using a Vendor that supplies Indirect Material.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Organizational Dept (Indirect)</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syorg__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>PO Controls (Group (Indirect Mtl Responsibility))</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>PO_Control_Records2</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, Inter System Direct Sales will be active for this Division, allowing purchase orders to be created directly from sales order lines.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Inter-System Direct Sales Active
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_intersystem__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Determines whether items added to PO lines are validated against the Purchase Item Master or the Item Vendor Master. Choices are "Select Items from POITEM file on POLINE addition" or "Select Items from POITEMVEND file on POLINE addition".
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Item Selection Default
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_itemselectfileind__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocntl__c.rstk__pocntl_itemselectfileind__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Valid values are: ‘P’ – Select Items from POITEM file on POLINE addition ‘V’ - Select Items from POITEMVEND file on POLINE addition Default = ‘P’ (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Determines whether items added to PO lines are validated against the Purchase Item Master or the Item Vendor Master. Choices are "Select Items from POITEM file on POLINE addition" or "Select Items from POITEMVEND file on POLINE addition".</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the lead time it takes a Buyer to place a PO for the given Division once MRP creates the requisition. It is expressed in days.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time To Place PO
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_ltplacepo__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, the Approval Status on a PO add will read "Submit for Internal Approval" and the PO will go through the approval process established. When unchecked, no approval process is used and the status will read "Submit PO to Vendor".
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Use Rootstock Approvals for POs
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_poapprvlind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value defines the default template for Purchase Order print and Email .
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Print Form Template
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_poprintemailtmpl__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, user will have the option of selecting from all active PO Print templates when printing a PO.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Allow PO Print Template Override
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_potemplovr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number of decimals allowed when setting Unit Price on PO Lines. This number of decimals will print on the po form.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Price Decimals
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_pricedecimal__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, system will print approved manufacturers on Purchase Orders.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Print Approved Manufacturers
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_printappmfr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, the unit price for a given PO Line will be displayed in the PO Receipt Details page.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Show Price in PO Receipt Details Page
toolingEntityParticle.MasterLabel: Show Price in PO Receipt Details Page
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_rcptshowprice__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Indicates Salesforce Approvals will be used for POs instead of the Rootstock Approvals process.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Use Salesforce Approvals for POs
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_sfapprovpohdr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Use Salesforce Approvals for Indirect Requisitions.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Use Salesforce Approvals for Ind. Reqs
toolingEntityParticle.MasterLabel: Use Salesforce Approvals for Ind. Reqs
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_sfapprovsyreq__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, any PO Lines that have been closed short will not be printed on PO. Unchecked, the PO will print closed short lines indicating the lines are closed at the current quantity.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Print Suppress Closed Short
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_supprintcl__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the default Group used to initialize the Requesting Group for a PO using a Vendor that provides Services.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Organizational Dept (Service)
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocntl_svrcrequestorg__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Search Index
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__searchindex__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field which is not currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: triggeroptions
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__triggeroptions__c
